Dialogue.name: Kroner
Lines: ugh...
Shit...
Hello?
Anyone breathing?

Dialogue.name: Lee
Lines: Yeah.
I've got Alexi here.
He's unconscious.

Dialogue.name: Kroner
Lines: Get him up.

Dialogue.name: Alexei
Lines: ugh...

Dialogue.name: Kroner
Lines: Morning Sunshine!
Hey bud, do me a favour and let me know how many fingers the Major is holding up.

Dialogue.name: Alexei
Lines: ummm...
None?

Dialogue.name: Kroner
Lines: Oh, that can't be right...
Sound to me like a concussion.

Dialogue.name: Lee
Lines: He's right, I'm not holding up anything
Alexei looks fine.

Dialogue.name: Kroner
Lines: Now Major, it is my expert opinion, as Head Chief Doctor Extrodinaire, MD. PHD. esquire, that you should hold up some fingers

Dialogue.name: Alexei
Lines: She's holding up one in particular.

Dialogue.name: Kroner
Lines: Much Appreciated!

Dialogue.name: Lee
Lines: Where is the captain?

Dialogue.name: Kroner
Lines: Well...
The thing is...
Looks like you're in charge now, Major.

Dialogue.name: Alexei
Lines: ...So What now?

Dialogue.name: Kroner
Lines: I think I saw a hill not far from here,
We might get a better signal for the comms.

Dialogue.name: Alexei
Lines: You think the others are still alive?

Dialogue.name: Kroner
Lines: I'm sure they are.

Dialogue.name: Lee
Lines: Okay, looks like we have a good ammount of supplies, and the rover's still intact.
Let's go.

Dialogue.name: Kroner
Lines: Sir Major Sir!

Dialogue.name: Kroner
Lines: *Pant* *Pant*
God, this whole place is like Santa's wet dream
Snow, you are not making a good first impression

Dialogue.name: Lee
Lines: Stop being a baby, we're almost there
Look at Alexei, he's doing fine

Dialogue.name: Kroner
Lines: Easy for you to say Colonel, you've got those fancy military subdermal cybernetics
Besides, I bet Alexei grew up in an igloo

Dialogue.name: Alexei
Lines: Not quite, last time I saw snow I was still in high school
The North is about as warm as the rest of the world
All this white is a little disorienting actu...
Woah

Dialogue.name: Lee
Lines: Now that's a view

Dialogue.name: Alexei
Lines: Frost falls and makes the world new

Dialogue.name: Kroner
Lines: Famous Quote or something?

Dialogue.name: Alexei
Lines: Something Alyanna used to say to me
What I'd give to show her this

Dialogue.name: Lee
Lines: You'll do that right after we find her, and the rest of the crew
Kroner, you have the Hermes set up?

Dialogue.name: Kroner
Lines: Yes Ma'am
Wait, what was that?

Dialogue.name: Alexei
Lines: What is it?

Dialogue.name: Kroner
Lines: Looks like a distress signal
It was brief, so they might have lost their beacon
But I definitly saw it

Dialogue.name: Lee
Lines: Where did it come from

Dialogue.name: Kroner
Lines: Yeah... that's the thing
It's on the other side of the world

Dialogue.name: Kroner
Lines: Hey, either of you find it weird that these trees look a little too ...earthy?

Dialogue.name: Alexei
Lines: It's crossed my mind, which makes me think maybe one of the other ships...

Dialogue.name: Kroner
Lines: You think they came down here and grew all this?
Isn't that a little far fetched

Dialogue.name: Alexei
Lines: That's the thing, remember that gravity ring we saw right before we crashed?
That definitly seemed like one of ours

Dialogue.name: Lee
Lines: Yes, it was strange that our ship's internal clocks were malfunctional
You think what, that we're hundreds of years late?

Dialogue.name: Alexei
Lines: Maybe thousands, those cryopods were designed to be able to work for pretty much ever
Plus the ship's solar cells would have kept us going

Dialogue.name: Kroner
Lines: So, we might be the only ones on this planet that remembers the ISO mission

Dialogue.name: Alexei
Lines: Could be...
We might even be the last humans ever

Dialogue.name: Kroner
Lines: Thanks for putting that thought into my head

Dialogue.name: Lee
Lines: Kroner, stop playing with the buggy, you're going to break something

Dialogue.name: Kroner
Lines: Whaaaaat?
I'll have you know that I'm very qualified to play with the buggy

Dialogue.name: Lee
Lines: I'll have you know that I'm very qualified to punch you in the face

Dialogue.name: Kroner
Lines: Duly Noted.

Dialogue.name: Kroner
Lines: Hey Colonel, *Ahem*
Do you want to build a snowman?

Dialogue.name: Lee
Lines: No

Dialogue.name: Kroner
Lines: Aww, come onnnnn
Where's your sense of wonder?

Dialogue.name: Lee
Lines: I lost it when you entered my life

Dialogue.name: Kroner
Lines: Ouch...

Dialogue.name: Kroner
Lines: Hey Alexei, not to be nosy but, how'd you lose the arm?

Dialogue.name: Alexei
Lines: Bomb
I'm glad that's all I lost

Dialogue.name: Kroner
Lines: I didn't know you were in the army
Must have been horrible

Dialogue.name: Alexei
Lines: I served for a few years, but that's not when I lost it
I was catching a train in Stalingrad

Dialogue.name: Kroner
Lines: Oh
Some people...
It still illudes me why a person would be driven to do something so heinous

Dialogue.name: Alexei
Lines: I was angry, and distraught for a while, but... it wasn't all bad
I'm glad Alyanna was there
She just made everything... alright

Dialogue.name: Kroner
Lines: She sounds like something else
We'll find her, I promise

Dialogue.name: Alexei
Lines: I hope you're right

Dialogue.name: Alexei
Lines: Hey Kroner, could you pass me that wrench?

Dialogue.name: Kroner
Lines: One wrench, coming up
What's wrong with her?

Dialogue.name: Alexei
Lines: Oh, nothing, just wanted to do some maintanence
You can never be too carful with these things

Dialogue.name: Kroner
Lines: I gotcha, had to do that all the time with ol' Bessie

Dialogue.name: Alexei
Lines: Weird name for a car

Dialogue.name: Kroner
Lines: Oh no, Bessie's my filing cabinet
You ever try to fix one of those thing?
All the thought gets put in cars and robots, and not a single soul wants to make a better cabinet

Dialogue.name: Alexei
Lines: Why not just store the files electronically?

Dialogue.name: Kroner
Lines: Good Point.

Dialogue.name: Lee
Lines: Alexei, you served in the army right?

Dialogue.name: Alexei
Lines: Uh, yeah, for three years

Dialogue.name: Lee
Lines: Engineer's Divison?

Dialogue.name: Alexei
Lines: 2nd infantry actually
You were Special Ops right?
Don't think I'll ever be able to do something like that

Dialogue.name: Lee
Lines: It's not so different from the regular forces, just more training
At the end of the day, it's still point and shoot
Kill or be killed

Dialogue.name: Alexei
Lines: I can see why you chose to joined up,
you seem like a natural for that sort of thing

Dialogue.name: Lee
Lines: Maybe...

Dialogue.name: Alexei
Lines: Hey Lee, why'd you decide to come to ISO?
You seem like you've still got army blood in you, through and through

Dialogue.name: Lee
Lines: Sometimes you just get tired of putting bullets in people's heads

Dialogue.name: Alexei
Lines: err...

Dialogue.name: Lee
Lines: Oh, sorry, that might have sounded a bit off putting
Though, it's partially true
The other part is... well, pretty silly

Dialogue.name: Alexei
Lines: Now I'm intrigued

Dialogue.name: Lee
Lines: My grandfather's an astronomer, and he used to dress me up in costume and we'd pretend we were in space together
I figured I try the real deal
Looked like the mission might need someone with my skillset anyways

Dialogue.name: Alexei
Lines: I've never heard you talk about your family...
When we left, were they still...

Dialogue.name: Lee
Lines: No... my grandfather passed away long before the mission
And, I don't really have any other family

Dialogue.name: Alexei
Lines: I'm sorry to hear that
I left my mom back home, and Alyanna still had two brothers
I guess they're all gone now

Dialogue.name: Lee
Lines: We would have been too, if we stayed

Dialogue.name: Alexei
Lines: I know...
but a part of me...

Dialogue.name: Lee
Lines: Don't.
We have a mission to fulfil, now pack up and let's go
